description.displayText: Stephanie was a truly exceptional caregiver to my mother in the last year of her life. She was extremely reliable, responsible, and knowledgeable. Moreover, she went above and beyond in her efforts to make my mother comfortable and happy. She really did treat her like family and gave me great peace of mind. Stephanie's clients and their families are truly lucky to find someone as capable and devoted as she is.
description.originalText: Stephanie was a truly exceptional caregiver to my mother in the last year of her life. She was extremely reliable, responsible, and knowledgeable. description.displayText: Stephanie is very caring compassionate dependable. Overall she is very dedicated to whomever she is taking care of ,she is awesome . I would highly recommend Stephanie
description.originalText: Stephanie is very caring compassionate dependable. Overall she is very dedicated to whomever she is taking care of ,she is awesome . I would highly recommend Stephanie

description.displayText: We hired Stephanie 2 years ago to take care of my Uncle. The minute she started taking care of him, she treated him as family & not as a job. He suffers from Dementia & is non-verbal but as soon as he saw Stephanie, he would smile & his eyes would light up. Not only did she treat him as family, but she treated us like family. Her compassion is unmatched, as she did everything for my Uncle without hesitation. Unfortunately due to his condition, we had to put him in Hospice. Therefore, our loss is now somebody's gain. Whoever hires Stephanie to take care of their loved one is hiring an Angel on Earth.
description.originalText: We hired Stephanie 2 years ago to take care of my Uncle. The minute she started taking care of him, she treated him as family & not as a job. description.displayText: Stephanie was hired to take care of my Uncle 2 years ago. From the minute she came into his life, she treated him as a person & not as a job. She doesn't do this for the money but for the love of the patient. She treated him like he was her own grandfather. And not only did she treat him as family, but she treated us like family & became a member of our family. My Uncle suffered from Dementia, so he didn't communicate verbally, but whenever I visited him, he would have a smile on his face thanks to Stephanie taking care of him. She did everything for my Uncle without hesitation. Unfortunately because of his condition, we have to to put my Uncle in Hospice, so our loss will now be someone's gain. Whoever hires Stephanie to take care of their loved one will be hiring an Angel on Earth.

description.displayText: I can't say enough about Stephanie. She is loyal, loving and more than capable of caring for an older patient.  I trust her more than I would a relative.  Stephanie has been caring for my Uncle for two years and has grown to love him.  She treats him like he is her father. She goes above and beyond what her job requirements are. She made sure he always had his favorite food especially desserts.  He loved chocolate and there was always some in the house. Unfortunately my Uncle suffers from dementia.  It has come to a point where he cannot open his mouth and has to be fed with a dropper and perhaps a feeding tube. So we had to send him to a Hospice facility.   Whoever is fortunate enough to hire Stephanie as your loved ones caretaker  is very lucky.  You won't be sorry.
description.originalText: I can't say enough about Stephanie. She is loyal, loving and more than capable of caring for an older patient.  I trust her more than I would a relative. It has come to a point where he cannot open his mouth and has to be fed with a dropper and perhaps a feeding tube. So we had to send him to a Hospice facility. description.displayText: Stephanie has been taking care of my uncle for over 2 years. She goes above and beyond in caring for him. Her attention to detail in every aspect of his care is like no other. She is a great communicator and is very proactive with his needs. She shows him love as if he was her own family. My family is so fortunate to have her caring for him. She has become a part of our family!
description.originalText: Stephanie has been taking care of my uncle for over 2 years. She goes above and beyond in caring for him. Her attention to detail in every aspect of his care is like no other. She is a great communicator and is very proactive with his needs. She shows him love as if he was her own family. My family is so fortunate to have her caring for him. She has become a part of our family!

description.displayText:
Stephanie worked with my mother for several years. My sister and I hired her as an aide originally, but she was so much more.

She was a case manager and coordinator. She was proactive in making sure there was always coverage for my mom, reached out to visiting nurse services with questions and concerns, organized shopping and bill paying, and so much more. 

I am not exaggerating when I say that my sister and I could not imagine the last couple of years without her. In addition to her professional skills and competency, Stephanie has always treated my mom kindly, even arranging a birthday party with balloons and decorations every year.

I recommend Stephanie highly.
description.originalText:

description.displayText: Stephanie has cared for my mom, who has dementia and other ailments, for over four years, and in that time has become an indispensable member of our family. She is smart, caring, organized, and proactive and provides us with the peace of mind that my mom's needs are being met.   I recommend her without reservation.
description.originalText: Stephanie has cared for my mom, who has dementia and other ailments, for over four years, and in that time has become an indispensable member of our family. She is smart, caring, organized, and proactive and provides us with the peace of mind that my mom's needs are being met.   I recommend her without reservation.

description.displayText: Stephanie is a warm and caring person. She is dependable and detail oriented. My mother is 93 years old and has memory issues and had a medical setback in March. Stephanie has played an intricate part the last six months in caring for my mother and helping her get back to a better place in life!
description.originalText: Stephanie is a warm and caring person. She is dependable and detail oriented. My mother is 93 years old and has memory issues and had a medical setback in March. Stephanie has played an intricate part the last six months in caring for my mother and helping her get back to a better place in life!

description.displayText: I do not even know where to begin when it comes to speaking of Stephanie's care of my father with brain cancer. Stephanie began working with us only a few hours a week, but then quickly began to increase her time with us, going to my fathers doctor appointments with him, managing his medication, and overseeing his care as I was out of state. When my father needed 24 hour care she put together a team of 3 caregivers and oversaw every aspect of it, from their schedules, to coverage during snow storms, holidays, etc. She is a life saver. She cares for my father as if he is her own. Every doctor, hospice worker, etc., who comes into my father's home, cannot help but comment on how well cared for he is. There is no one like Stephanie and any family would be lucky to have her care for someone, regardless of the challenge, Stephanie handles it with care, not just for the patient, but she is a constant source of comfort for the family.
